colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,('DI'I LO RGYUS DANG PHAN YON NI, SNGON TSE RGYA GAR BOD KYI ZA HOR RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA ZHIG YOD, ,RGYAL BA SLON PO SOGS GSER DNGUL RTZAS NOR DANG 'BRU LA SOGS LONGS SPYOD RAB TU RGYAS, GLONG CHE RNGA MONG SKANG PHYUGS GRANGS MED MANG ZHING PHYUGS PA DANG, MNGA' THANG CHEN PO RGYAL PO DE BU MED PA'I PHYIR BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA @006B SDUG YOD PA LAS, LO GSUM LON PAR NAS RGUD PA CHEN PO 'BYUNG LA, NOR PHYUGS ZAD PAR BU TSA 'PHONGS PAR GYUR CING, ,MI LAN TSA NAD RIMS SHI CHAD DANG, PHYUGS LA GOD KHA RGYUN MI CHAD PA'I CHED DU, ,GROL BA'I MAN NGAG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,^ SHU DHA DZA N'A PRA NYDZAS BRIS SO,, ,,)
